item.title: 30-Day Instagram Content Calendar for 90s/Early 2000s Ecommerce Website - Upwork
item.description:
Nostalgia content is incredibly popular on social media, resonating deeply with the millennial & Gen Z audiences. However, most brands struggle to position themselves directly alongside the nostalgic toys, collectibles, clothes, and items often featured in such content.  Enter: ThrowbackBuys.com! With an anticipated launch in mid to late July, we are seeking a skilled Social Media Strategist freelancer to develop a content calendar focused on building pre-launch hype and driving post-launch engagement and conversions.

Objectives:
Pre-Launch (First 15 Days): 1) Generate awareness and excitement for the upcoming launch 2) Drive sign-ups to the "ThrowbackClub" by offering a 10% discount on the first order and early access to launch collections.
Post-Launch (Next 15 Days): 1) Leverage nostalgia-led content to drive traffic and sales on ThrowbackBuys.com. 2) Increase IG followers & drive brand engagement

Deliverables:
-Research and Inspiration: Identify and analyze the most popular 90s/2000s nostalgia content creators. Draw inspiration from successful content styles and trends, incorporating them into the content calendar.
-Content Calendar: Develop a 4-week (30 days) content calendar. Include a mix of stories, posts, and reels, with a minimum of 2 posts of any combination per week.
-Instagram Reels: Create at least four (4) 15-second IG Reels. Each reel should lead with a strong nostalgia theme and conclude with a clear call-to-action (CTA) to shop at ThrowbackBuys.com. Ensure reel formatting is optimized for both IG Reels and profile posts.
Spotlight Reel: Develop a specific reel tributing Lonnie Johnson, the founder of the Super Soaker, tying it to the nostalgia theme and ThrowbackBuys’ offerings.
Preferred Content Types to include in calendar:
-Polls: Engage the audience with interactive questions.
-"Who remembers this?" posts/stories: Trigger nostalgic memories and interactions.
-Featured Throwback: Highlight specific products with compelling visuals and descriptions.

Additional Information:
Focus on weaving existing nostalgia content styles and trends into the creative process.
Ensure all content aligns with ThrowbackBuys' brand voice and aesthetic.
The goal is to create a seamless blend of nostalgic appeal and modern social media engagement tactics

Skills required:
- Strong familiarity of 90s and early 2000s pop culture
- Proficiency in Instagram Reels
- Video editing proficiency
- Excellent content planning and organizational skills
- Understanding of social media marketing best practices

Size: Small
Duration: Under 1 month
Expertise Level: Intermediate

Budget: $450
Posted On: July 01, 2024 21:08 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:UGC, Facebook, Video Advertising, Graphic Design, Social Media Marketing, Content Writing, Adobe Photoshop, Instagram, Adobe Illustrator, Social Media Management, Ecommerce Marketing, Video Editing
Skills: UGC, Facebook, Video Advertising, Graphic Design, Social Media Marketing, Content Writing, Adobe Photoshop, Instagram, Adobe Illustrator, Social Media Management, Ecommerce Marketing, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Editor Adobe Premiere, Content Programming, Social Media Marketing - $600 a full time month plus - Upwork
item.description:
This is for a full time position, and we are looking for someone who has 3 years + of the following skills.

Adobe Premiere Editor
Must be able to take an hour long podcast, and /or a finished documentary, and make necessary edits, add logos, ads, bumpers, countdowns, commercials, then output for release online (lower resolution), and a 2nd output for high quality output of the final product.
Must be able to make 10 second to 2 minute shorts longer content to be used to promote the shows on social media. The shorter/most bang for your buck, the better. Then add logos etc, output it to conform with posting sizes, and to also create a 2nd high quality backup.
Photoshop - Must be able to recreate/format already existing PSD files for new thumbnails. This work involves rotoscoping still images, usually a person, and placing them upon the preexisting template for a show.
Content Programming.
We are creating a daily program schedule of content and one of the tasks is to take the finished product, via video editing via premiere, and thumbnail editing via photoshop, and then the finished product is programmed in a specific time slot, with that time slot being updated whenever we have the information.
We can teach the person how to prepare these videos for the live schedule.  
Social Media “bites’ editing. These are 10 second to 2 minute cutdowns of short segments that this individual will edit, add logos, then output for social media marketing.

The following may be a second person, but if you can also do the following, please let us know.
Social Media “bites’ editing. Making 10 second to 2 minute cutdowns  out of hour long episodes, adding logos, then output for social media marketing.
Social Media Marketing. Taking cutdowns of shows with logos, etc, and using them to promote the America Happens brand and the shows that we are marketing.
Marketing the shows via:
Reaching out to influencers and building relationships.
Reaching out to other influencers to ask they share content.
Reaching out to people with good followings that can repost
Reaching out to influencers for collaborations, and or interviews
Reaching out to like minded brands and people to direct them to America Happens shows.

$50 Bonuses offered for success in growth of the social media subscribers and followers.
This is a 40 hour a week job, with potential 30 more hours of just social media marketing / brand marketing if the person chooses to seize it, with $50 bonuses for success in social media growth.
A 3 Month contract will be offered after a 1 Month Paid Trial.



Budget: $600
Posted On: July 01, 2024 20:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Photoshop, Social Media Video, Video Commercial, Video Stream, Instagram Reels, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Adobe Photoshop, Social Media Video, Video Commercial, Video Stream, Instagram Reels, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Social Media Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
Who We Are:
Here at KIN, we do marketing and coaching for martial arts schools. Our mission is to empower martial arts school owners to impact more lives and become financially free while doing what they love. We are passionate about marketing for martial arts schools because the byproduct of our great work is we introduce thousands of people around the world to martial arts, which contributes to to them living happier and healthier lives. We understand that content is king and so we lean into capturing high-quality content that tells our clients stories, builds relationships with their ideal students and makes them lots of money.

Your Role:
We produce tons of content for our own company and for our clients. The majority of our content consists of short-form Meta Ads. As our video editor, you will be responsible for putting together the content in a way where it tells the story, holds the audience's attention and gets them to take action. We are looking for someone with a creative eye who wants a long-term career at a company they can grow with for the years to come. We want to be known as the greatest company in our industry for growing martial arts schools and creating timeless work we can be proud of. In order to make that happen, we understand we need to assemble A-team players. We want someone who is hungry, who has a creative eye and, most importantly, who has good morals and blends well with our culture. Initially, we will work on a per-project basis to ensure it’s a good fit. If it is a good fit, we’ll invite you to join the team full-time.

Here’s what your responsibilities will consist of:
- Editing client's Meta Ads
- Editing our Meta Ads
- Editing our reels
- Editing our YouTube videos and long-form content
- Working with the team on content strategy so we are constantly improving

Benefits:
- Work from home
- Career development training
- Interaction with the founder
- Company gatherings
- Personal development
- Opportunity to grow income and responsibilities

If this resonates with you, you’re a massive action-taker and you’re ready to make an impact, then we would like to invite you to apply to join our team.

P.S. Here's links to some of our existing content. We would like to hear how you would improve it:
- https://drive.google.com/file/d/1J0RsjoWcZN01LgeNq_pNP5eF2ePP33kF/view?usp=drive_link
- https://drive.google.com/file/d/1m2kuPWF432wSP2DXNIauGEo_mFkQy105/view?usp=sharing
- https://drive.google.com/file/d/1IprUuHHFOIs9C30Mf13ZuZuY3ne2FTzR/view?usp=drive_link
- https://drive.google.com/file/d/1t6tLYUpdt1ITZGrstzGwWb9PAYPKZ189/view?usp=drive_link
- https://drive.google.com/file/d/1aWeuyKZNtYSLarRzyP3z1AI1BN65Xy4F/view?usp=sharing


Hourly Range: $20.00-$50.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 20:39 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Video Animator and Editor Needed for Conference Ad - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking a talented video animator and editor to create a 1:30 minute advertisement for our upcoming conference. The video will explain how attendees will use new headsets to listen to Posters during the conference.

Responsibilities:

Create a compelling and informative 1:30 minute video ad.
Explain the usage of new headsets for listening to Posters at the conference.
Utilize the provided YouTube video as a reference: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P_oyFlbIvMY&t=141s
Incorporate detailed information from the attached write-up.
Collaborate with our team for further clarifications and feedback.

Requirements:
Proven experience in video animation and editing.
Strong portfolio showcasing similar projects.
Ability to communicate complex information clearly and engagingly.
Attention to detail and commitment to meeting deadlines.

Last year's copy attached for reference.

Hourly Range: $11.00-$17.00

item.title: Very talented sports short-form editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced, creative Short-Form Video Editor to join our client's team and contribute to his mission of making an impact in the sports media world.

Must be a big sports fan and very knowledgable on the space.

In this role, you will be responsible for editing and producing short-form content that drive engagement.

Inspiration:
https://www.instagram.com/p/C51jvQKxa9p/
https://www.instagram.com/p/C5RVfJTxv37/


**APPLICANTS WHO DO NOT SUBMIT A DEMO REEL/PORTFOLIO OF THEIR BEST VIDEOS WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED**

The pay will be a base of $2000 for 1 video edit per day. (Content will be given in advance).

Responsibilities:

Edit 1 short-form video per day.

Comply with and utilize our systems for clip coordination, pulling content, uploading, and revisions.

Requirements:

- Proven experience as a short-form video editor, preferably working with Adobe Premiere Pro
- Knowledge of social media platforms, trends, editing styles & best practices.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills with a strong attention to detail.
- Strong organizational and project management skills with the ability to prioritize and meet deadlines.
- Ability to work on weekends/after hours if and when needed.

Company Overview:

We help entrepreneurs scale their brands and business through content. We do this by building the ultimate content strategy for them and executing it to perfection.

Our Core Values:

Creativity; Greatness; Integrity; Fun; Ambition.

Our Culture:

We are a fun and vibrant company always looking to create the most engaging and entertaining content possible. We believe in innovation driving success behind hard work and fun.

If you are passionate about social media and are eager to make an impact in the industry, we want to hear from you. Please submit your resume and cover letter detailing your experience and qualifications for this exciting opportunity.

Schedule:
Flexible as long as you can deliver 1 video edit per week.

Experience:
Video editing: 2 years experience with Adobe Premiere or Final Cut Pro (Our training process pairs with Adobe Premiere.)

Pay: There is a $2000 monthly base offered with incentives based on performance.

FULLY Remote + semi-flexible schedule!

Must complete a Zoom interview + skills test before hiring.

Hourly Range: $25.00-$50.00

item.title: Video Editor for Health and Fitness YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and creative video editor to join our team and help us with the editing of 10 videos for our health and fitness YouTube channel. we are planning to launch 1 video weekly.  Each video is approximately 12 minutes long. As a video editor, you will be responsible for enhancing the visual appeal of the videos by selecting the best shots, adding relevant graphics and effects, and ensuring seamless transitions. Additionally, you will need to synchronize the audio, remove any unwanted background noise, and apply color correction when necessary.

    Key skills:
    - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
    - Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
    - Knowledge of health and fitness industry
    - Excellent communication and collaboration skills

    This is a medium-sized project expected to be completed within 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level video editor who has prior experience in editing health and fitness content. If you are passionate about health and fitness and have a keen eye for detail, we would love to hear from you.

Budget: $150
Posted On: July 01, 2024 20:22 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: Seeking Video Editor for Instagram reel content - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and creative video editor to create engaging and captivating video clips for promoting private yacht rentals. The ideal candidate will have experience in creating content for Instagram Reels and Reels ads, with a strong emphasis on quick turnarounds and high-quality production.

Responsibilities:
- Edit provided video footage of yachts into engaging and visually appealing clips. Stock content can be used for additional elements, but yacht footage must be taken from the original content provided.
- Incorporate provided catchy texts, "This is Your Sign" angles, "Send This to a..." angles, and funny/joke angles into the videos.
Create a test clip initially to ensure the style and quality meet our standards.
- Ensure all videos are optimized for Instagram Reels and Reels ads.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in video editing, especially for social media platforms like Instagram.
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
- Ability to deliver high-quality work with a quick turnaround.
- Strong attention to detail and creativity.
- Excellent communication skills and ability to understand and implement feedback.
- The final video must be suitable for use as ad content on Instagram, and the music selection is crucial to enhance viewer engagement and must comply with Facebook's regulations for music in ads.

Deliverables:
- One test clip based on provided footage and text.
- A series of finalized video clips ready for Instagram Reels and Reels ads.

If this collaboration works well, we would need ongoing help for future projects.

---
Please submit your portfolio showcasing your previous work on social media video editing, especially for Instagram Reels. Include a brief description of your experience and why you would be a good fit for this project. Additionally, provide your availability and expected turnaround time for the test clip and subsequent videos and also estimated price per video.


Hourly Range: $11.00-$15.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 20:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Videography
Skills: Instagram Reels, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Videography
Country: Australia
click to apply
